abstract: The governor's office organized the flood of e-mail to emphasize that Republicans were united in their opposition to the proposed map, which was approved by a state commission.
snippet: The governor's office organized the flood of e-mail to emphasize that Republicans were united in their opposition to the proposed map, which was approved by a state commission.
lead_paragraph: Nearly every major Republican politician in Arizona issued a news release this week - all within an hour or so of one another on Wednesday afternoon - condemning a draft redistricting map approved by a state commission.

headline.main: Arizona Republicans Disapprove of Draft Redistricting Map
